definition: electrical lead/connecting line/(Tw) to connect (to a network, device etc)/to go online/connection/(congressional) caucus
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Circumstances, we come to the connection of the South Korean journalists stationed Zhang Ling.
sentences.chinese: 具体情况，我们来连线本台驻韩国记者张玲。

sentences.english: You may use an online printer to print out the data.
sentences.chinese: 你可以使用连线印表机把资料列印出来。

sentences.english: The speculation over alignments isn't surprising, though, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他还表示，这种对星系连线的猜测并不奇怪。

sentences.english: The Regent broke the connection and Edwards sat there, his head swimming.
sentences.chinese: 瑞金特切断了连线，爱德华兹坐在那里，头晕目眩。

sentences.english: Connect the low point of the two peaks, we can get the neckline.
sentences.chinese: 颈线之所在，是连接双峰间低点的连线。

sentences.english: Do you got Bravura on the line for us?
sentences.chinese: 你帮我连线布鲁温了么？

sentences.english: Now the PC and its network connection are all hers.
sentences.chinese: 现在，她的电脑及网路连线全归她一个人独享了。

sentences.english: PRI offers the same service as a T1 or DS1 connection.
sentences.chinese: 每个PRI都能提供与T1或DS1连线相同的服务。

sentences.english: Finish 1b. Match the seasons with the weather and activities.
sentences.chinese: 将各季节与对应的天气和活动连线。

sentences.english: In this thesis, we focus on unicast service connections only.
sentences.chinese: 在本论文中，我们只考虑单一播送的连线服务。

sentences.english: The port or device is already disconnecting.
sentences.chinese: 连接埠或装置目前已经中断连线。

sentences.english: When activated, the pineal gland becomes the line of communication with the higher planes.
sentences.chinese: 当受刺激激活的时候，松果体与更高层面的通讯连线。

sentences.english: This indicates that it received the previous acknowledgment and finalizes the connection process for this session.
sentences.chinese: 这表示它己接收先前的确认且完成此交谈的连线程序。

sentences.english: Wired's use of touchscreen functionality and interactivity is a start.
sentences.chinese: 《连线》对触屏和互动性的利用只是一个开始。

sentences.english: I could probably get them through inter-library loan.
sentences.chinese: 或许我能通过电脑连线向其他图书馆调借书籍。
无法连线到目的连接埠。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to establish ties or contact/in series connection (electricity)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
